metadata.title: USN-6597-1 -- Puma vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Puma incorrectly handled parsing chunked transfer encoding bodies. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Puma to consume resources, leading to a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6597-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  puma - 5.6.5-3ubuntu1.2 No subscription required
